section.title: Logical Networks in ovirt-engine
section.para: By default the management network, called ovirt-engine is defined for a data center. New logical networks, for example for data, storage or display can be defined by the administrator. In general, logical networks are created to isolate network traffic by functionality or virtualize a physical topology. In addition, other networks can be used to segregate virtual machine traffic from the management networks, or isolate traffic between groups of virtual machines in the same cluster. warning.para: Do not change networking in a Data center or a Cluster if any hosts are active. This may make the hosts unreachable.
